Experimental (mostly as demonstration) tracing of Rendering performance
==============================

Example uses bcc (linux) and berkley-packet-filter (bpf) to instrument
ustd tracepoints (e.g. with system-tap sdt or folly static tracing).


command to run:
```
sudo python artekmed_rendering_performance.py --pid=$(pidof artekmed_p1) 
```

prerequisite:
- install bcc from https://github.com/iovisor/bcc/blob/master/INSTALL.md
- build artekmed_p1 with option "ubitrack_core:enable_tracing=True"


limitations:
- ubitrack tracing somehow does not yet work properly.

Example output:
```
$ sudo python artekmed_rendering_performance.py --pid=$(pidof artekmed_p1) 
Attaching probes to pid 20758
Tracing... Hit Ctrl-C to end.
```
